card.name: Elspeth, Sun's Champion
card.property: +1: Create three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. −3: Destroy all creatures with power 4 or greater. −7: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control get +2/+2 and have flying."

card.name: Banisher Priest
card.property: When Banisher Priest enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Banisher Priest leaves the battlefield. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)

card.name: Captain of the Watch
card.property: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.) Other Soldier creatures you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance. When Captain of the Watch enters the battlefield, create three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

card.name: Celestial Flare
card.property: Target player sacrifices an attacking or blocking creature.

card.name: Court Street Denizen
card.property: Whenever another white creature enters the battlefield under your control, tap target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Dauntless Onslaught
card.property: Up to two target creatures each get +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Decree of Justice
card.property: Create X 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying. Cycling {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Decree of Justice, you may pay {X}. If you do, create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

card.name: Dictate of Heliod
card.property: Flash Creatures you control get +2/+2.

card.name: Gempalm Avenger
card.property: Cycling {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Gempalm Avenger, Soldier creatures get +1/+1 and gain first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Gustcloak Harrier
card.property: Flying Whenever Gustcloak Harrier becomes blocked, you may untap it and remove it from combat.

card.name: Gustcloak Savior
card.property: Flying Whenever a creature you control becomes blocked, you may untap that creature and remove it from combat.

card.name: Gustcloak Sentinel
card.property: Whenever Gustcloak Sentinel becomes blocked, you may untap it and remove it from combat.

card.name: Gustcloak Skirmisher
card.property: Flying Whenever Gustcloak Skirmisher becomes blocked, you may untap it and remove it from combat.

card.name: Icatian Javelineers
card.property: Icatian Javelineers enters the battlefield with a javelin counter on it. {T}, Remove a javelin counter from Icatian Javelineers: It deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Kinsbaile Skirmisher
card.property: When Kinsbaile Skirmisher enters the battlefield, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Kor Skyfisher
card.property: Flying When Kor Skyfisher enters the battlefield, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Loxodon Partisan
card.property: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)

card.name: Mighty Leap
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Mortal's Ardor
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

card.name: Mother of Runes
card.property: {T}: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Noble Templar
card.property: Vigilance Plainscycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Precinct Captain
card.property: First strike Whenever Precinct Captain deals combat damage to a player, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

card.name: Raise the Alarm
card.property: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

card.name: Soul Parry
card.property: Prevent all damage one or two target creatures would deal this turn.

card.name: Standing Troops
card.property: Vigilance

card.name: Sunlance
card.property: Sunlance deals 3 damage to target nonwhite creature.

card.name: Veteran Armorsmith
card.property: Other Soldier creatures you control get +0/+1.

card.name: Veteran Swordsmith
card.property: Other Soldier creatures you control get +1/+0.

card.name: Secluded Steppe
card.property: Secluded Steppe enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W}. Cycling {W} ({W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Kiora, the Crashing Wave
card.property: +1: Until your next turn, prevent all damage that would be dealt to and dealt by target permanent an opponent controls. −1: Draw a card. You may play an additional land this turn. −5: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of your end step, create a 9/9 blue Kraken creature token."

card.name: Accumulated Knowledge
card.property: Draw a card, then draw cards equal to the number of cards named Accumulated Knowledge in all graveyards.

card.name: Aetherize
card.property: Return all attacking creatures to their owner's hand.

card.name: Inkwell Leviathan
card.property: Trample Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

card.name: Man-o'-War
card.property: When Man-o'-War enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Omenspeaker
card.property: When Omenspeaker enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Peel from Reality
card.property: Return target creature you control and target creature you don't control to their owners' hands.

card.name: Scourge of Fleets
card.property: When Scourge of Fleets enters the battlefield, return each creature your opponents control with toughness X or less to its owner's hand, where X is the number of Islands you control.

card.name: Sealock Monster
card.property: Sealock Monster can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. {5}{U}{U}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) When Sealock Monster becomes monstrous, target land becomes an Island in addition to its other types.

card.name: Surrakar Banisher
card.property: When Surrakar Banisher enters the battlefield, you may return target tapped creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Whelming Wave
card.property: Return all creatures to their owners' hands except for Krakens, Leviathans, Octopuses, and Serpents.

card.name: Explore
card.property: You may play an additional land this turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Explosive Vegetation
card.property: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Grazing Gladehart
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may gain 2 life.

card.name: Nessian Asp
card.property: Reach {6}{G}: Monstrosity 4. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put four +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

card.name: Netcaster Spider
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Whenever Netcaster Spider blocks a creature with flying, Netcaster Spider gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Time to Feed
card.property: Choose target creature an opponent controls. When that creature dies this turn, you gain 3 life. Target creature you control fights that creature. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

card.name: Coiling Oracle
card.property: When Coiling Oracle enters the battlefield, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand.

card.name: Kiora's Follower
card.property: {T}: Untap another target permanent.

card.name: Lorescale Coatl
card.property: Whenever you draw a card, put a +1/+1 counter on Lorescale Coatl.

card.name: Nimbus Swimmer
card.property: Flying Nimbus Swimmer enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Plasm Capture
card.property: Counter target spell. At the beginning of your next precombat main phase, add X mana in any combination of colors, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.

card.name: Simic Sky Swallower
card.property: Flying, trample Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

card.name: Urban Evolution
card.property: Draw three cards. You may play an additional land this turn.

card.name: Evolving Wilds
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Temple of the False God
card.property: {T}: Add {C}{C}. Activate this ability only if you control five or more lands.
